value.assignInventoryHelp: Assigns an item to a user's inventory
value.tradeMessage: **{userTagReceiver}**, **{userTag}** would like to trade their '{itemName}' with you! React to this message using üÜó to confirm
value.tradeMessageAccepted:
**{userTagReceiver}**, please type `!trade `{userTag}` shibeNumber` to trade one of your shibes for a **{itemName}**
(You can get your shibe numbers from `!inventory`)
value.sellError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory followed by the number of bepis you want to sell the item
value.buyError: **{userTag}**, please specify a valid item number from the shop
value.buySuccess: **{userTag}**, you have bought **{itemName}** from **{sellerTag}** for {paidCoins} bepis <:bepis:466777977179602996>
value.buyNotEnoughCoins: **{userTag}**, you don't have enough bepis to buy that item
value.sellErrorCoins: **{userTag}**, please enter a value greater than 0
value.unSellError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory.
value.catchWaitMessage: üö´ **{userTag}**, you need to wait another **{hours} hours, {minutes} minutes, and {seconds} seconds** before catching another Shibe
value.generateInvite:
**{userTag}**, please use the following link to invite your frens:
{inviteLink}
value.eventFailCatchMessage: **{userTag}**, you've already participated in this event.
value.giveAwayError: **{userTag}**, please specify the item number from your inventory
value.giveAwayMessage: **{userTag}**, you've received {receivedCoins} bepis for **{itemName}**. Now you have {totalCoins} bepis <:bepis:466777977179602996>!
value.giveAwayErrorShop: **{userTag}**, you can't give away items that are currently for sale in the shop
value.tradeErrorShop: **{userTag}**, you can't trade items that are currently for sale in the shop
value.tradeError: Could not trade items since one of the items is no longer available
value.newTrick: Teaches the bot a new command that uses a keyword to execute a function
value.generateInviteHelp: Generates an invite link. Gives you bepis for any new members that join using your link.
value.eventHelp: Gives away a random item from the event channel.
value.invShowHelp: Shows an item from the inventory
value.invTrashHelp: Removes an item from your inventory
value.invFuse: Fuses two items together forming a new item
value.tradeHelp: Trades an item with other person
value.tradeSellHelp: Sells an item from the inventory
value.tradeUnSellHelp: Stops selling an item from the inventory
value.tradeBuyHelp: Buys an item from the shop
value.tradeGiveHelp: Releases an item from your inventory in exchanage for bepis
value.tradeFlipCoinHelp: Flips a coin with 50% chance of winning or losing
value.giveCoinsHelp: Give away bepis to another user
value.createCoinsHelp: Create bepis and add them to a user

help: Indicates the level of difficulty from 1-5 for items to be randomly chosen (5 is very difficult)
